DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess if ketamine will induce, in healthy volunteers, impairment of working memory and if the drug AZD8529 will block the effects of ketamine on working memory as assessed by functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI).
DOC.brief_title: The Effects AZD8529 on Ketamine-induced Impairment of Working Memory in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Right handed 12th grade education or equivalent Able to read and write English as primary language History of head injury Substance abuse or dependence History of claustrophobia
